snippet: Rules stemming from the Dodd-Frank Act aim to rein in risky Wall Street trading and prevent a financial crisis.
abstract: Rules stemming from the Dodd-Frank Act aim to rein in risky Wall Street trading and prevent a financial crisis.

headline.main: In New Rules to Shine Light on Derivatives, Regulators Also Allow Exemptions
headline.print_headline: A Rule Sets Overhaul Of Wall St. In Motion

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
